title: SJB to launch protest march from Kandy to Colombo
body_lines: The Samagi Jana Balawegaya (SJB) has launched an anti-government protest march from Kandy to Colombo on April 26.

SJB Senior Vice President and Chief Opposition Whip Lakshman Kiriella said the protest will be against the crisis pertaining to fertilizer, violation of human rights, absence of rule of law and the high cost of living.
“The march which will be led by Leader of Opposition and SJB Leader Sajith Premadasa and will begin near the Kandy Central Bus Stand at 9am on Tuesday April 26,” Mr. Kiriella said.(Yohan Perera )
